text: The Uls () is a river in Perm Krai, Russia, a left tributary of the Vishera.Uls in encyclopedia of Perm Krai The river is long, and its drainage basin is . It starts near the border with Sverdlovsk Oblast. Its mouth is near the village of Ust-Uls, from Vishera's mouth. Main tributaries (from source to mouth): *Left: Olkhovka, Pelya, Bolshaya Zolotanka; *Right: Surya, Bolshaya Lyampa, Kutim, Myka . == References == Category:Rivers of Perm Krai
title: Uls
